name: advhub-dashboard
description: AdvHub Dashboard - Frontend Next.js + Backend NestJS

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix front && npm install --prefix back
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix front" "npm run start:dev --prefix back"
scripts.build: npm run install:all && npm run build --prefix front && npm run build --prefix back
scripts.build:railway: cd back && pnpm install && pnpm run build
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix front" "npm run start:prod --prefix back"
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix front && npm run lint --prefix back
